directions: Spoon about 2 teaspoons ice cream onto 12 Snack Factory(R) Pretzel Crisps(R), and smooth out over the pretzel.  Top with a strawberry slice and a square of chocolate candy bar.  Add a small dollop of ice cream on top to hold the sandwich together. Top with remaining Pretzel Crisps(R).
Arrange on a serving plate and place in the freezer for about 15 minutes or until the ice cream is re-frozen before serving.
ingredients: 1/2 cup strawberry ice cream, or as needed
title: Mini Ice Cream Pretzel Sandwiches
